title: Occam's Razor
description: What's wrong with your patient?Do all the symptoms and signs point to one diagnosis?Or are there multiple diseases at work?Can you remember which symptoms indicate which diseases?From the designers of 'The Healing Blade' comes Nerdcore Medical's second game release, Occam's Razor. Created by two physicians to be both a game and a study aid, this is a must-have for health sciences students and professionals. Quick to play and easy to learn, the game draws on the classic theories of Occam's razor and Hickam's dictum to challenge your diagnostic ability. Play with a group, or take a break and play a game of solitaire.There are four different ways to play:Gin Rummy Occam:Collect the highest scoring hand of matching symptoms.Deduce the Disease:Be the first to deduce the hidden disease card.Occam Solitaire:Match symptoms in order to clear all your face-down piles.Spoons:Include family and friends in a fun, fast-paced game that requires no previous medical knowledge.Game on! Have fun, and learn while you're at it.See our video at the  occamsrazorgame.com website.

title: Nutrihill Resveratrol Lozenges
description: Everyone knows that resveratrol is an amazing ingredient and may have many beneficial effects. However, what is less known is that a conventional oral resveratrol pill delivers little resveratrol into the bloodstream. While working through the gut and liver, resveratrol is substantially (>98%) damaged in the process. A resveratrol lozenge solves the problem effectively. Studies show intraoral absorption delivers over a hundred times more resveratrol into the bloodstream than simply swallowing it. It's the most effective way to take resveratrol supplement. Each lozenge contains 20 mg of resveratrol extract of the highest purity available (>99%). Ingredients: Trans-Resveratrol (as Japanese knotweed (Polygonum cuspidatum) root extract, 99%), Isomalt, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate. Contains no sugar, no artificial flavoring & coloring, no silica, no preservatives. 60 Lozenges per bottle.

title: Emotions & Essential Oils: A Modern Resource for Healing
description:
Essential oils are widely used for their physical health benefits, but few have understood the scope of their healing capabilities. In this, the first installment in the series, Daniel Macdonald introduces essential oils as powerful emotional healers. This groundbreaking manual bridges the gap between the physical and emotional aspects of essential oils and creates a user-friendly guide for taking charge of emotional health.

Each of the listed essential oils and blends is analyzed for its effect on feelings and emotions. This easy to follow reference will help you come to know the oils in a new way and more fully appreciate their distinct healing qualities. For long-time oil enthusiasts and beginners alike, Emotions & Essential Oils will inspire you with the genius and beauty of Mother Nature's finest of gifts.

title: ParaCease (120 Capsules)
description:
A parasite & candida cleanse. This is a *one* month supply.

Parasites are not the sort of subject you like to discuss. Least of all you don't want to think that you could be host to them in your own body! Yet parasites are now considered to be the primary causes of occasional digestive disorders, and may affect up to 100% of the American population. Orthodox medicine is at a loss on how to treat occasional intestinal irregularity largely because pharmaceutical drugs and poor lifestyles cause them. But these are taboo subjects in most physicians' offices. Alternative practitioners, however, have learned how our ancestors dealt with these problems, and have spent years developing techniques which promote healthy digestion and overall health.


Valerie Saxion's Silver Creek Lab's ParaCease Formula contains these powerful, natural anti-parasitic compounds: 


* Black Walnut (hull) 
* Olive Leaf Extract * Pumpkin (seed) - an herb with anti-parasitic properties. 
* Cascara Sagrada - a bowel mover. 
* Quassia (bark) 
* Garlic (bulb) - an anti-fungal, anti-bacterial herb. 
* Mineral Blend 
* Methylsulfonymethane (MSM). 
* Wormwood (aerial part) - a digestive aid with anti-parasitic properties. 
* Thyme (leaf) - an herb with digestive soothing properties. 
* Long Pepper (fruit) 
* Rosemary (leaf) 
* Grapefruit Extract (seed/pulp) - an anti-microbial and anti-fungal agent. 
* Pau D' Arco (bark) 
* Bismuth Salicylate 
* Clove (fruit) - a digestive aide/helps eliminate gas. 
* Sodium Caprylate 
* Other Ingredients: Rice Flour, croscarmellose sodium, silicon dioxide, magnesium stearate, and gelatin.

title: Diagnostic Points for Equine Conditions Chart
description: With the help of colors and schemes, this two-page chart makes it easy to understand diagnostic points for equine conditions. On the first page there is a list of acupuncture points that are used as a diagnostic aid for equine conditions. Such conditions are: shoulder, carpus, fetlock, foot, hip, stifle, hock or tendon/ligament related lameness; stomach pain, possible EPM, hormone-associated syndrome or immune-mediated myofascial syndrome. On this page the points are shown in relation to the horse skeleton. On the second page the points are shown on a picture of a horse and they are grouped according to the condition they are used to diagnose. The use of colors helps to visualize which points are used to diagnose the various conditions that this chart considers.

title: Washable WETJET MOP TERRY pad REFILL FOR SWIFFER
description:
The Pad will attach to SWIFFER wetjet as a clean MOP PAD. It is reusable and washable. The pad was made of double layer of Terry CLOTH/ polyester, which is handmade and eco-friendly cleaning. 
  1. Why made with DOUBLE layer of terry cloth/polyester, NOT simpler SINGLE layer Shammy cloth?
We did try use Shammy cloth before, which is cost-saving (cheaper material, easier production and lighter for shipping).  However, it fails in many ways. First, once it grabs some dirt, it sticks to pad permanently and never goes off. The pad has to be toss away after several times usage. Second, it has problem in absorbing water. Due to its thin layer, the dirty water will squeezed back to floor once you push the mop. Then after several jets, you will find the floor is still wet and dirty. Cheap one layer of shammy cloth will just kill the main point of the mop--wet jet!! The worst thing about the shammy cloth is, it is torn apart so easy that you actually spend more rather than saving money!  
One side of my pad is made with 100% cotton terry cloth, which is as thirsty as your shower towel. That's why we get back to terry cloth, and so far this is the best option on the market!
2. Why not use Velcro to make sure the pad can attach the holder?
  I initially choose Velcro and it does attach the holder but makes the pad uneven! The consequence of using Velcro is the pad "attach" evenly only to the holder but not to the floor!!! Do you really want your pad only work with the holder? I guess not. I tried a lot of different materials and only Terry cloth give satisfied result and best feedback! The terry cloth will attaches to both the holder and the floor evenly. 
Try this refilled pad for your SWIFFER wetjet! You won't regret!!  
It will definately save you a lot and also keep the floor clean.

title: Lasting Impression
Sedona Suite
Forest Rain
description: A warm, reflective paean to North American temperate rainforests,Forest Rainfrom flautist-keyboardist Dean Evenson stands as one musician's interpretive soundtrack of the moods, subtleties, and cycles inherent in the few remaining stands of such forests. Recorded in 1993, a few of Evenson's synthesizer textures may sound faintly dated (appearing a bit too shiny in places), but this is a minor distraction in an otherwise well-executed recording notable for its sense of calm and its elevated degree of musicianship. More than tree-huggers playing simplistic melodies, Evenson and company (d'Rachel and wife Dudley Evenson on harp, Jonathan Kramer on cello) create gentle atmospheres (some with keyboards, some without) that eschew overt melodicism in favor of evocative soundscapes that capture the quiet majesty of grand trees. Highlights: Evenson's softly searching flute passages in the 10-minute "Deep Forest"; the glowing,Suzanne Ciani-like "Branching Out"; and the closer, "Prayer for the Ancient Trees," featuring the drumming and chants of a Lummi Nation member. The disc's attractive packaging includes an educational insert outlining the benefits humans derive from a healthy temperate rainforest.--Terry Wood

title: Birthday
description: Originally released in 1997 by Ralph Covert prior to the creation of kidrock phenom Ralph's World, the leader of The Bad Examples recorded this gentle acoustic album for adults following the birth of his daughter Fiona. While not truly a children's music album, it can be enjoyed by the whole family. Several songs were later re-cut for Ralph's World discs, or used in theatrical musicals, and are now part of his family concert repertoire. This original collection is promoted as an adjunct to the Disney discs.

title: Johnson's Whacks
description: Although a leading modern bluesman, Chicago's Jimmy Johnson is poorly represented on six-inch disc. This fairish, newly remixed 1979 set-a farrago of good songs and throwaways- features his high, sharp voice taking an anguished turn while his guitar slashes mercilessly in grief. Johnson's band is no better than acceptable, with pianist Carl Snyder faring poorly for the fresh sound manipulation-- © Frank John Hadley 1993--From Grove Press Guide to Blues on CD

title: Medicine 4 My Pain
Wild Sounds Transylvania Wallachia & Moldavia
J. S. Bach: Easter Oratorio/Magnificat (Ton Koopman)
description: Bach's celebration of Easter is a mostly joyous one, opening with a three-movement sinfonia, richly orchestrated, and complete with trumpets and drums: the third movement includes the chorus inviting listeners to rejoice and hasten to the tomb of Jesus, "For our Savior has awakened." There follow recitatives and arias for Mary Magdalen, Mary, the mother of James, Peter, and John. Each character goes through grief to love and gratefulness, and Bach's endlessly inventive scoring, melodic lines, and changing orchestral textures take us on a rich, 40-minute musical journey to peace. Only a too-long soprano aria tends to wear. The Oratorio is coupled on this CD with Bach's justly famous 12-movement setting (in 25 minutes) of the Magnificat text from Luke. Also elaborately scored, with the vocal choices, tempos, and mood changing every couple of minutes, this is one of the great works of Western liturgical music (Gardiner'smasterly reading of this work is a must-have). The performances, on Baroque instruments and with crisp, clean, unsentimental Baroque style, are exemplary. Rejoice!--Robert Levine

Conair WJ7B Interplak Water Jet
description: Tired of the dentist urging you to floss just a little more diligently? The path to dental  righteousness can also be found through "oral irrigation." It's true. The Interplak dental water jet  uses powerful pulses (2,650 per minute) to flush food debris from hard-to-reach places between  teeth and under the gum line, thus preventing dreaded plaque (the leading cause of gingivitis and  gum disease). Gentle yet thorough, this jet is an ideal tool for cleaning around crowns,  bridgework, and orthodontic braces. It can be used with water, mouthwash, or antibacterial dental  rinse. Seven different pressure settings enable you to vary water flow for maximum personal  comfort and results, and a convenient button on the handle puts on/off control right at your  fingertips. The 10-ounce tank comes with a protective cover and lifts off of the  5-1/4-inch-by-3-3/4-inch base for easy filling and cleaning. With 3 feet of coiled hose, you have plenty of room to  maneuver. The unit's four color-coded, easily interchangeable jet tips make this an ideal unit for  the whole family, and it'll leave your dentist speechless!--Erin Brown

title: Liquid Love
description: "Anyone hearing Nika is simply knocked out by her remarkably gorgeous tone - something from the angels."   --Dr. Herb Wong, Jazz Historian"Her improvisation was beautiful, imaginative, swinging....anything but predictable; but what we were really hearing was how much she meant every note of it."  --Robert Tate, Jazz NowOf her previous CD, Bridge Weaver, "There are only a handful of working flutists with whom to compare her - old hands Frank Wess, Herbie Mann, James Moody.  A solid debut that demands an encore."  --Jack Bowers, Jazz Now

title: The Creature Plastic Model Kit
description: The last remnant of a 15-million-year-old species, the creature  from the black lagoon was neither fish nor human, but a hideous  combination of both. Scales, gills, long webbed claws, and a pulsating  slash for a mouth gave the creature a ghastly quality that catapulted  themovieto instant cult-classic status in 1954. Here, he's forever  captured in all his heartbreaking grotesqueness: arms raised, he  emerges from the primeval swamp with vengeance in his haunted eyes. His  reptilian companions--a hissing lizard and a venomous-looking  snake--flank him; in the foreground are the bony remains of a hand.  The 29-piece kit's sturdy styrene pieces are more substantial than you'll find  in most kits these days; the finished model is about 9 inches tall.  It's not complicated, but you'll need care and patience when putting it  together (and maybe some light sandpaper or an emery board). Paint and  cement aren't included, but the instruction sheet indicates colors for  each piece. And if you don't feel like painting the gill-man, he looks  pretty convincing in his moss-green unpainted state.--Julie  Ubben

title: Maglite M2A01H AA Mini Flashlight and Holster Combo-Pack, Black
description: With its high-intensity adjustable light beam and compact size, the Mini Maglite Two-Cell AA Flashlight and Holster Combo Pack offers limitless around-the-house and on-the-go options. This slender flashlight succeeds where flimsy plastic flashlights fail, providing a steady, fast-focus stream of light wherever and whenever you need it. For easy portability, the flashlight comes with a nylon holster with belt loop.At a Glance:Portable and lightweight at 3.8 ouncesHigh-strength aluminum constructionSpot, candle, and flood modesIncludes holster and spare lampHands-free, candle-like illumination.View larger.Fast-focus beam adjusts from spotto flood with a turn of the head.Compact Flashlight Provides Limitless UsesWhether you're hunting for something in the back of your closet, changing a fuse, looking for something behind the couch, or checking under the hood of your car, you'll appreciate the Mini Maglite's simple, straightforward, and reliable design.With an overall length of only 5.75 inches and a weight of just 3.8 ounces (with included batteries), the Mini Maglite is easy to handle and hold, even when working in tight spaces.Its small size and included holster also makes it ultra-portable and perfect for emergency storage, hiking, camping, and thousands of other uses, so you're never caught without a flashlight when you need one.Three Light Modes for VersatilityThe Mini Maglite boasts a unique candle mode that allows you to remove the head and expose the bulb to shed light in all directions, just like a candle. You can flip the head over and place it on a solid surface to create a sturdy holder for the "candle"--a great option when you're camping, at an outdoor concert, or entertaining after dark in your backyard.This handy flashlight also has spot and flood modes--simply rotate the head half a turn to choose the light intensity you need.Durably Constructed for a Lifetime of UseThe Mini Maglite features solid, precision-machined, high-strength aluminum construction that resists wear and tear, even after years of use. Anodized inside and out for corrosion resistance, this flashlight has rubber O-rings for water and shock resistance.For further durability, a patented vented tail cap reduces the chance of gas buildup. The tail cap also stores a spare lamp, so you'll always have light when you need it.The Mini Maglite is backed by a limited lifetime warranty.Maglite: An Icon of American IngenuityPrior to the introduction of the Maglite flashlight in 1979, flashlights were generally regarded as unreliable, throw-away items. That all changed when Anthony Maglica revolutionized the portable lighting industry with his unique technology. By combining superior design with reliability, durability, and an unprecedented lifetime warranty, Maglite produces reliable, iconic flashlights that are designed exclusively in the USA and are built by American workers.What's in the BoxMini Maglite, two 'AA' premium-cell alkaline batteries, and holster.The flashlight's miniature size and high-intensitybeam are ideal for working in tight spaces.

title: Energizer Max Alkaline, Size D, 8 pack
Energizer E92BP-4 AAA Batteries (4-Pack)
description: Whether you're looking to light up a pathway, power your remote control, or fill your ears with portable music, this bundle of four AAA Energizer alkaline batteries does the trick. Alkaline batteries offer significant advantages over other battery types, including long-lasting power, compatibility with a wide variety of electronic devices (including toys, smoke alarms, and much more), a low initial cost compared to lithium and NiMH rechargeable batteries, and an impressive seven-year shelf life. Energizer offers a further enticement by offering to repair or replace--at the company's option--any device damaged by the batteries. In addition, Energizer was the first company (in 1989) to remove all added mercury from its alkaline batteries, so users can safely dispose of them in the household trash. title: OXO Good Grips Soap-Dispensing Scrub Brush
description: Washing dishes is always a chore, but this little gadget makes it just a little easier--or at least keeps your hands out of the water and away from detergents, eliminating wrinkly raw hands. When the brush wears out, it's easily replaced; when the soap runs out, a turn of the brush head lets you add more. The Good Grips line features durable, nonslip flexible handles on every product. Ergonomically designed to fit the palm comfortably and softly, the pressure-absorbing processed rubber handle puts less tension on the hands, while providing an outstanding grip. Made from the same material as are dishwasher gaskets are constructed of, the handles are slip-proof, wet or dry, as well as dishwasher-safe. Good Grips products are moderately priced and have won the Tylenol/Arthritis Foundation Design Award.--Laurie Notaro

title: OXO Good Grips Broom
description: As with most Oxo products, the soft rubber handle makes doing hard work with this broom much easier than with others. Also, with its angled, 10-inch bristle head, you have better contact with the floor and are able to cover more space in less time--always a boon when sweeping, a chore that is often very tedious.--Jane DePaolo

title: OXO Good Grips Heavy Duty Scrub Brush
description: This scrubber is perfect for countertops and other large work surfaces because of its wide bristle area. With two types of stiff nylon bristles to tackle the chore, the bar brush is great for tile, Corian, Formica, or even polished concrete--bristles won't lose their shape no matter how hard you scrub. The Good Grips line features durable, nonslip flexible handles on every product. Ergonomically designed to fit the palm comfortably and softly, the pressure-absorbing processed rubber handle puts less tension on the hands, while providing an outstanding grip. Made from the same material as dishwasher gaskets are constructed of, the handles are slip-proof, wet or dry, as well as dishwasher-safe. title: OXO Good Grips Corners and Edge Brush
description: Oxo has been winning awards and gaining customers with its Good Grips kitchen utensils and gadgets for the last 10 years. By paying close attention to design details that combine comfort and utility, Oxo has been able to greatly expand its product line. This heavy, durable brush is a fine example. Its rounded face of plastic bristles reaches into corners and envelops counter edges to scrub away grime, making it useful in either the kitchen or bathroom. The fat, tapered handle, with its familiar rubber grip that doesn't slip when wet, fits firmly in the hand. The handle is gently curved to relieve stress on hands and wrists while accomplishing tough chores and has a hole for hanging on a hook or peg. The brush can be cleaned in the dishwasher.--Fred Brack

title: OXO Good Grips Soap-Dispensing Sponge Brush

description: With this well-designed dustpan and its sturdy matching whiskbroom, sweeping up small spills or dust is easy. title: OXO Soap Dispensing Kitchen Brush
description: This Soap Dispensing Kitchen Brush makes cleaning your dishes less of a chore. It has a soft button that doubles as a seal; just pull open the seal and fill the clear body with soap. Reseal the opening, and you're ready to dispense soap with the press of a button. Sturdy nylon bristles are perfect for scrubbing. The soft handle absorbs pressure and keeps your hand comfortable as you scrub. Safe for use on non-stick cookware.

title: OXO Good Grips Household Scrub Brush
description: Great for getting the gunk out of tile grout and versatile enough to remove stains from carpet, this brush combines two different types of bristles to conquer household chores. Perhaps the nicest feature about the brush is the raised handle that keeps hands and fingers away from soiled surfaces and cleaning solutions. The nonslip handle gives you great leverage when scrubbing, and allows you to exert a good deal of force without risking sore, stiff hands and knuckles. Ergonomically designed to fit the palm comfortably and softly, the pressure-absorbing processed rubber handle puts less tension on the hands, while providing an outstanding grip. Made from the same material as dishwasher gaskets are constructed of, the handles are slip-proof, wet or dry, as well as  dishwasher-safe. Good Grips products are moderately priced and have won the Tylenol/Arthritis Foundation Design Award.--Laurie Notaro

description: Lightweight and with a full plume of layered feathers, this ostrich duster is a natural villain to a dusty bookshelf, windowsill, or fan. Real ostrich feathers naturally attract dust; usually just one sweep leaves surfaces clean and dust-free. And this cleaning tool has a large opening for easy hanging storage. The egg-shaped handle fits comfortably in the palm of the hand, absorbs pressure, and is nonslip, wet or dry. A suction-cup hanger makes storage easy when you're finished.--Laurie Notaro

title: OXO Good Grips Bottle Brush
description: With two types of bristles and a flexible neck, the bottle brush by Oxo is the ultimate weapon in cleaning skinny bottles and narrow jars. Because of the brush's flexible neck and rounded head, nooks and crannies are easy to get to and get clean. The nonslip handle stays firmly in place--even under running water--and absorbs pressure and tension away from hands.--Laurie Notaro

description: This grout brush is a perfect companion to tiled countertops, floors, walls, and shower stalls. It attacks grime with two types of bristles, and its pointed head accesses corners and other hard-to-reach spots with ease. When your chores are through, hang this tool to let it dry, thanks to an oversize opening in the handle. The Good Grips line features durable, nonslip flexible handles on every product. description: The Casabella chamois life preserver may look a little odd, but it is a practical cleaning tool. title: Digital Alcohol Detector BT3300
description: Using advanced gas-sensor technology, the Precision Navigation BT3300 digital personal alcohol detector can be used to measure the concentration of alcohol in your breath. Blood alcohol concentration (BAC) is displayed in easy-to-read numbers in increments of .01 percent, ranging from .00 to .19 percent BAC. The unit beeps when the meter is ready to use and after a breath sample is registered. This detector also gives an error warning when it fails to get a complete sample. The BT3300 is compact and light, not much larger than a disposable lighter.Important note: The manufacturer warns users that the product should be used only to give an indication of the possible presence of alcohol in the blood. Do not rely upon it to determine intoxication or whether it is safe to drive a vehicle or operate equipment. Readings do not constitute evidence of sobriety or intoxication in a legal case involving alcohol and driving.

title: Emjoi AP-9GAR Gently Gold Caress Rechargeable Hair Remover
description: This electric device plucks hair from legs, face, underarms, and bikini lines to give you smooth skin for up to six weeks. It operates at two speeds to deal with different hair types and removes hairs as short as .5 mm, so it can even be effective just one day after shaving. To minimize pain, the device uses 36 high-speed, tweezerlike, gold-plated disc sets to gently stretch the skin before plucking hairs, and the head curves to fit the body. It's cordless, recharges from a wall socket, and comes with an 8-foot cord. A loofa-like pad to scrub away removed hairs, a cleaning brush for the device, and a soft, pliable, vinyl carrying bag are included.--Fred Brack

title: Sonicare PS-1 Sonic Toothbrush
description: By combining 31,000 brush strokes per minute and gentle sonic waves, Sonicare electric toothbrushes scrub away decay-causing plaque from between teeth and along gum lines better than ordinary toothbrushes. Two full-refund guarantees are offered on this model (30-day satisfaction guarantee and 90-day improved-care guarantee), plus a 1-year warranty on the handle against defects. This Sonicare model shuts off after 2 minutes to indicate when cleaning time attains the recommended duration (the brush can be restarted), and ramps up to full speed slowly over the first 12 uses to reduce soreness for people unaccustomed to thorough cleaning (this feature can be turned off). The power handle holds a charge for about two weeks.--Fred Brack

title: Sonicare PL-4 (4700) Sonic Toothbrush
description: By combining 31,000 brush strokes per minute and gentle sonic waves, Sonicare electric toothbrushes scrub away decay-causing plaque from between teeth and along gum lines better than ordinary toothbrushes. Two full-refund guarantees are offered on this model (30-day satisfaction guarantee and 90-day improved-care guarantee), plus a 2-year warranty on the handle against defects.This is Sonicare's top-of-the-line model, offering all available features: an interval timer that beeps every 30 seconds to encourage thorough cleaning of each mouth section; an automatic shutoff after 2 minutes to indicate when cleaning time attains the recommended duration (the brush can be restarted); a ramp-up that gently increases brushing power during the first 12 uses to reduce soreness for people unaccustomed to thorough cleaning (this feature can be turned off); and a recharge indicator light that signals when charging is needed and when it's in progress. This model serves three family members with their own brush heads; it comes with two compact heads and one ultra-compact head with a longer shaft and fewer bristles for better maneuverability (great for kids). A countertop holder for brush heads not in use and a three-slot brush-head travel case are included. The power handle holds a charge for about two weeks.--Fred Brack

title: Sonicare Ultra Compact Brush Head
description: By combining 31,000 brush strokes per minute and gentle sonic waves, Sonicare electric toothbrushes scrub away decay-causing plaque from between teeth and along gum lines better than ordinary toothbrushes. This brush head fits any Sonicare toothbrush power handle. For maneuverability, it's extra compact in size--40 percent smaller than a standard-size brush head. Like all Sonicare brush heads, it is color-coded and has soft, rounded, rippled bristles for cleaning hard-to-reach areas. A sticker is included to place on the charger base as a reminder when a change of brush heads is needed.--Fred Brack

title: Sonicare QP3 Sonic Toothbrush
description: By combining 31,000 brush strokes per minute and gentle sonic waves, Sonicare electric toothbrushes scrub away decay-causing plaque from between teeth and along gum lines better than ordinary toothbrushes. Two full-refund guarantees are offered on this model (30-day satisfaction guarantee and 90-day improved-care guarantee), plus a 2-year warranty on the handle against defects. This Sonicare model serves two family members with their own compact-size brush heads, has an interval timer that beeps every 30 seconds to encourage thorough cleaning of each mouth section, shuts off after 2 minutes to indicate when cleaning time attains the recommended duration (the brush can be restarted), and ramps up to full speed slowly over the first 12 uses to reduce soreness for people unaccustomed to thorough cleaning (this feature can be turned off). The power handle holds a charge for about two weeks. A countertop brush-head holder is included.--Fred Brack

title: Philips Sonicare Standard Brush Head
description: By combining 31,000 brush strokes per minute and gentle sonic waves, Sonicare electric toothbrushes scrub away decay-causing plaque from between teeth and along gum lines better than ordinary toothbrushes. This brush head fits any Sonicare toothbrush power handle. For maneuverability, it's compact--20 percent smaller than a standard-size brush head. Like all Sonicare brush heads, it is color-coded and has soft, rounded, rippled bristles for cleaning hard-to-reach areas. A sticker is included to place on the charger base as a reminder when a change of brush heads is needed.--Fred Brack

title: Emjoi AP-9FEA1 Beauty Forever Hair Remover
description: Safe and imperceptible, radio frequencies are sent out from this electric device to weaken the roots of unwanted hairs so they slide out painlessly. Ideal for face, breasts, bikini lines, and eyebrows, the device employs two attachments: a tweezer-action coil for multiple hairs and gold-plated tweezers for single hairs--though hairs don't actually need to be tweezed out unless they are exceptionally stubborn. A noninvasive, hygienic, inexpensive alternative to electrolysis, the hair remover offers three speeds for different hair types. It comes in a flip-top, hard plastic case with a built-in mirror. The case measures 2-1/2 by 6-1/2 by 6-1/2 inches.--Fred Brack

title: Norelco 6865XL Quadra Action Cord/Cordless Rechargeable Men's Shaver
description: This 7-watt electric razor puts three individually floating shaving heads to work clearing away stubble. The stainless-steel heads adjust automatically in multiple directions to fit the face while the blades shave in two stages: with slots for long hairs and with holes for short hairs. Operating either with a cord or cordless, the razor provides a pop-up trimmer for mustaches and sideburns and rinses clean after use. It's perfect for the traveling man because it works worldwide on 110- to 240-volt systems, recharges fully in one hour or charges in six minutes for a three-minute shave, and comes with a soft, molded plastic travel case. For those on the go, this shaver can be recharged from any 12-volt car or boat battery (special adapter cable is not included). Norelco provides a 60-day, full-refund satisfaction guarantee after three weeks of use and a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Norelco 6826XL Quadra Action Cord/Cordless Rechargeable Men's Shaver
description: This 7-watt electric razor puts three individually floating shaving heads to work clearing away stubble. The stainless-steel heads adjust automatically in multiple directions to fit facial contours, while the blades shave in two stages, with slots for long hairs and holes for short hairs. Operating either with the cord or cordless, the razor provides a full-width pop-up trimmer for mustaches and sideburns and rinses clean after use. It's perfect for the traveling man because it works worldwide on systems from 110 to 240 volts, recharges fully in one hour for 45 minutes of shaving time or charges in six minutes for a three-minute shave, and fits into a nylon travel pouch. For those on the go, this shaver can be recharged from any 12-volt car or boat battery (special adapter cable is not included). Norelco provides a 60-day, full-refund satisfaction guarantee after three weeks of use and a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Norelco 6885XL Deluxe Quadra Action Cord/Cordless Rechargeable Men's Shaver
description: This 7-watt electric razor puts three individually floating shaving heads to work clearing away stubble. The stainless-steel heads adjust automatically in multiple directions to fit facial contours, while the blades shave in two stages, with slots for long hairs and holes for short hairs. Operating either with the cord or cordless, the razor provides a pop-up trimmer for mustaches and sideburns and rinses clean after use. It's perfect for the traveling man because it works worldwide on systems from 110 to 240 volts, recharges fully in one hour for 45 minutes of shaving time or charges in six minutes for a three-minute shave, and fits into a soft, molded plastic travel case. For those on the go, this shaver can be recharged from any 12-volt car or boat battery (special adapter cable is not included). An LCD light signals when recharging and/or cleaning is needed. There's also a plastic stand to store the razor upright. Norelco provides a 60-day, full-refund satisfaction guarantee after three weeks of use and a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Conair GMT180QCS/GMT180TDCS Rechargeable Beard & Mustache Trimmer
description: Sure, youcoulduse any old pair of clippers to trim your beard or mustache, but would you want to subject your perfectly blended, nicely tapered facial hair to the indiscriminate buzzing of a wide clipper? Any self-respecting beard wearer knows the answer. Designed for the specific styles and needs of beards and mustaches, Conair's trimmer boasts a chromium-steel blade for precise cutting and a five-position attachment comb for blending, tapering, and trimming. Also included are a mustache comb and a jawline comb so you can get that final blend just right. Running on three rechargeable AA batteries, the trimmer comes complete with a holding stand and lubricating oil.--Ariel Meadow Stallings

title: emjoi
description: Safe and imperceptible, radio frequencies are sent out from this electric device to weaken the roots of unwanted hairs so they slide out painlessly. Ideal for nostrils, ears, eyebrows, and nose, the device employs a tweezer-action coil to grasp several hairs at once--though hairs don't actually need to be tweezed out unless they are exceptionally stubborn. Pressing the buttons of the hair remover's sides for 15 to 20 seconds is usually all it takes to weaken the roots and slide out the hairs. A noninvasive, hygienic, inexpensive alternative to electrolysis, the hair remover operates on four AA batteries (not included). It measures 5-1/2 inches long, and the battery pack is 5 by 2-3/4 inches.--Fred Brack

title: Norelco 4821XL Micro Action Corded/Cordless Rechargeable Men's Shaver
Norelco 5811XL Reflex Action Cordless Electric Shaver
description: This electric razor puts three individually floating shaving heads to work clearing away stubble. The self-sharpening stainless-steel heads adjust automatically in multiple directions to fit facial contours while the blades provide 45 hair lifters and 45 rotating blades to shave below the skin. Operating either with the cord or cordless, the razor has a full-width pop-up trimmer for mustaches and sideburns. It's perfect for the traveling man because it works worldwide on systems from 110 to 240 volts, includes an LED charging indicator, recharges fully in one hour for 30 minutes of shaving time or charges in six minutes for a three-minute shave, and fits into a nylon travel pouch. Norelco provides a 60-day, full-refund satisfaction guarantee after three weeks of use and a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Norelco 5615X Advantage Wet/Dry Cordless Rechargeable Men's Shaver
description: This water-resistant, 3-1/2-watt cordless electric razor shaves wet or dry facial skin while dispensing shaving lotion with the push of a button. It also automatically adjusts to facial contours with three individually floating self-sharpening stainless-steel shaving heads, provides 45 hair lifters and 45 rotating blades to shave below the skin, and comes with a full-width snap-on trimmer for mustaches and sideburns. It's perfect for the traveling man because the charging stand works worldwide on systems from 110 to 240 volts, the fully recharged razor provides 36 minutes of shaving time, and the razor fits in a travel pouch large enough to hold the razor and two additional lotion cartridges. Shaving lotion cartridges snap in easily, and pump buttons on both sides of the head dispense the lotion. (Six Nivea lotion cartridges are included.) The head rinses clean after use. Norelco provides a 60-day, full-refund satisfaction guarantee after two weeks of use and a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Norelco HQ4 Micro Action Lift and Cut Tripleheader Replacement Heads
description: These three stainless-steel heads fit Norelco Micro Action razors only. Installing them is simple, and the package provides illustrated instructions. Combined, the three heads provide 45 hair lifters and 45 rotating blades to shave below the skin. They adjust to individual facial contours for a smooth, effortless shave.--Fred Brack

title: Philips Norelco HQ167 Cool Skin Replacement Heads for 6700 Series
description: These three stainless-steel heads fit into Norelco's Wet/Dry Advantage  razors only. Installing them is simple, and the package provides illustrated  instructions. Combined, the three heads provide 45 hair lifters and 45 rotating  blades to shave below the skin, whether it's wet or dry. They adjust to an  individual's facial contours for a smooth, effortless shave.--Fred Brack

title: Norelco 5841XL Deluxe Reflex Action Cord/Cordless Rechargeable Men's Shaver
description: This compact, cordless electric razor automatically adjusts to facial contours with three individually floating stainless-steel shaving heads, provides 45 hair lifters and 45 rotating blades to shave below the skin, and comes with a full-width, pop-up trimmer for mustache and sideburns. It's perfect for the traveling man, because it works worldwide on 110- to 240-volt systems, can be used with or without the coiled cord, recharges fully in 1 hour to provide 45 minutes of shaving time, provides a 6-minute quick charge for a 3-minute shave, and comes with a cleaning brush in a 6-1/2-inch-long travel bag. An LED meter on the razor displays the charge level and blinks when charging is needed. Norelco provides a 60-day, full-refund satisfaction guarantee after 2 weeks of use and a 2-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Conair HC100RCCS 12-Piece Haircut Kit
description: Children's hair grows incredibly fast, and when you've got two or more kids, it can feel like you're spending half your budget on haircuts. When you decide you're done paying someone else to cut your family's hair, invest in Conair's nine-piece haircutting kit. For about the cost of one haircut, you'll get everything you need to do basic cuts on any length of hair.At the core of the kit are the clipper and four comb attachments. Using the instruction booklet, clipper, and the four combs (1/8, 1/4, 3/8, and 1/2 inch), you can give popular haircuts like bobs or fades and simple crew cuts. You'll also find everything you need to maintain your clippers, including a cleaning brush and clipper oil. Two-year warranty.--Ariel Meadow Stallings

title: Philips Norelco HQ6 Replacement Head
description: These three stainless-steel heads fit Norelco Quadra Action razors only. Blades in the heads shave in two stages, with slots for long hairs and holes for short hairs. Installing them is simple, and the package provides illustrated instructions. They adjust to individual facial contours for a smooth, effortless shave.--Fred Brack

title: Conair HLM10 Hot Lather Machine
description: This is not a gadget for the guy who's nostalgic for the days of soap bowls and shaving brushes. Shake your can of shaving foam, slide it into this 9-inch-high unit, and a minute later it will dispense preheated lather right into your hand. The warm lather feels better on your skin and softens hair for a smoother, closer shave. It works with most standard-size (11- or 14.75-ounce) foam cans but is not intended for use with shaving gel.--Richard Farr

title: Sonicare Ultra Compact Brush Heads, Set of 2
description: By combining 31,000 brush strokes per minute and gentle sonic waves, Sonicare electric toothbrushes scrub away decay-causing plaque from between teeth and along gum lines better than ordinary toothbrushes. These two brush heads fit any Sonicare toothbrush power handle. For maneuverability, they're extra compact--40 percent smaller than standard-size brush heads. Like all Sonicare brush heads, they're color-coded and have soft, rounded, rippled bristles for cleaning hard-to-reach areas.--Fred Brack

title: Norelco HP2750 Ladyshave Wet/Dry Rechargeable Shaver
description: This compact cordless razor is far more versatile than that old shaving standby, the disposable razor. If you've ever hurriedly tried to use a disposable razor on dry skin, you probably wore the scars for some time. In contrast, this shaver can safely be used on wet or dry skin. And if you use it in the bath, it can be submerged in water. Because it's cordless and extremely light, it feels as maneuverable as any disposable model. The difference is a closer, safer shave--and you won't have to worry about running out of razors. A total body shaving foil guarantees a smooth shave all over, and two built-in trimmers work on longer hairs. Powered by a nickel-cadmium battery, the razor takes eight hours to recharge. If you've never used an electric razor before, it may take some practice to get the closest shave possible. Be sure and read the enclosed instructions to avoid skin irritation.--Laura Cuthbert

title: Conair NE150NSCS Cordless Nose and Ear Hair Trimmer
description: Let's discuss something no one wants to talk about: ear and nose hair. It's simply a reality of life that, as we age, hair in these places can become longer and thicker. Despite the fact that no one wants to talk about it, unsightly hair doesn't go unnoticed; each of us can remember the dentist we had as a child, whose nose hair we'd gaze at as our teeth were worked on. Conair's cordless nose and ear hair trimmer can help you avoid becoming like that dentist. Engineered to safely cut hair in nostrils and ears, this trimmer's sheathed stainless-steel blades eliminate the painful risk of using scissors. Simply insert the tip of the trimmer and let it do its thang. Then we'll never have to discuss this topic again, will we? Two-year warranty.--Ariel Meadow Stallings

title: Oral-B Power Toothbrush Ultra Plak Control 1 ea
description: Small and round for maneuverability inside the mouth, the brush  head on this battery-powered toothbrush rapidly oscillates to scrub  away plaque from between teeth and along gums better than ordinary  toothbrushes. Extra-long, interdental-tip bristles on the brush head's  outer edge clean deep between teeth, and soft, rounded middle bristles  do their work gently and safely without the need for firm pressing. The  brush head's colored bristles fade halfway when the brush head needs  replacing. Ideal for travel, the power handle, which uses two AA  batteries (which are included), has a nonslip grip and carries a  two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: HoMedics BMAT-2 Bubble Spa Bath Mat Massager with Remote Control
description: Fit this soft mat into any bathtub, run the flexible hose from the control unit into the water, and the tub instantly becomes a bubble massage spa. The 47-by-14-inch mat adheres firmly to the tub with suction cups and fills with air to cushion the body. The 8-foot hose, which also attaches to the tub with a suction cup, delivers bubbles on command. Using either the LED-illuminated touch pad on the control unit or the non-LED remote control, select the massage duration (15, 30, or 60 minutes), the massage strength (high, medium, or low), the bubble speed (high, medium, or low), and either steady bubbles or one of three variable bubble patterns. The water-resistant remote control operates with batteries (not included) and fits into a holder that adheres to wall or tub with a suction cup. The control unit's power cord measures 80 inches. The spa carries a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Braun Replacement Lens Filters, 40ct
description: Designed to ensure accuracy and hygiene, these disposable plastic lens filters fit all Braun ThermoScan ear thermometers. There are two boxes in the package, each holding 20 lens filters, for a total of 40.--Fred Brack

title: Braun 7526 Syncro Shaver System with Clean & Charge Storage Stand
description: With a pivoting head that oscillates from side to side and large foil holes to capture more hairs in fewer strokes, this shaver delivers a quick, smooth shave. When you're done, the shaver stores in a stand that cleans, lubricates, and charges it so it's in perfect condition for the next shave. Operating with or without a cord, the razor has a pop-up trimmer for mustache and sideburns and works worldwide on 110- to 240-volt systems. It recharges fully in one hour for 50 minutes of shaving time or charges in three minutes for a quick shave. The razor, cord, and cleaning brush fit into a leather traveling case. The Clean & Charge stand offers three options: clean, charge, or both. Cleaning fluid is drawn from a cartridge (included, with refill cartridges available) that lasts for about 30 cleaning cycles and inserts easily into the stand. The shaver carries a two-year warranty against defects (foil and cutter block excluded).--Fred Brack

title: HoMedics 4-Piece Aroma Sampler Set
description: Used with the AromaSphere and AromaSpa Diffusers from HoMedics,  these friendly, bright aromatherapy beads transform into refreshing and  soothing scents. Each of the four 22-gram jars features a distinct  fragrance made from solidified essential oils. HoMedics gives each  scent a name that suggests how you'll feel breathing it in:  Invigoration blends rosemary, lemongrass, and jasmine. Inhalation  combines eucalyptus, peppermint, and lemongrass. The green Rejuvenation  mixes seaweed with orange and lemongrass. Relaxation mingles lavender,  chamomile, and sage. The screw-top jars are handy for reclosing and  storage, and the beads are easy and clean to use.--Emily Bedard

title: Braun 1000FC Precision Series Foil/Cutterblock Replacement Pack
description: Have you noticed a decline in your electric shaver's performance? Try replacing the blade. For optimum shaving performance, it should be replaced every 18 months. In fact, regular shavers estimate their shaves are 25 percent smoother after they replace a worn blade. This replacement blade snaps in easily for an instant improvement in your shave. For an even better shave, clean all parts regularly.--Laura Cuthbert

title: HoMedics US-2HDB Ultra Spa Pedicure Footbath & Massager
description: Filled with warm water, this electric footbath, now with twice the bubble power of the previous model, presents a pleasing dilemma: massage your feet with the bath's warm, vibrating bottom and warm them with penetrating infrared heat? Massage, warm with infrared heat, and stimulate with bubbles? Or just treat those tired, aching tootsies to a warm, bubbling bath? (You'll need to use warm water to fill the bath; it will not heat cold water.) A control dial offers those three options. Plus, you can insert rollers in the bottom for saving your soles.Plus,there's a rack containing three more options: a pumice stone, a brush, and a massage device whose top is covered by roller balls. On the bath's divider is a post covered by a cap. Remove the cap; replace with stone, brush, or roller balls; press down with your foot; and your selection will vibrate to working life. Made of plastic, the footbath measures 18 by 15-1/2 by 7 inches and is about 3 inches deep. It carries a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Philips Norelco HQ5 Shaving Heads
description: These three stainless-steel heads fit Norelco Reflex Action razors only. Installing them is simple, and the package provides illustrated instructions. Combined, the three heads provide 45 hair lifters and 45 rotating blades to shave below the skin. They adjust to individual facial contours for a smooth, effortless shave.--Fred Brack

title: THERA P MAGNETIC THERAPY SYSTEM
description: Embedded in this set's back/shoulder wrap are 15 bipolar, waveform, 800-gauss magnets. The set also includes two small, one-magnet patches; two medium, two-magnet patches; and three large, four-magnet patches. The patches can be applied to hands, wrists, knees, elbows, ankles, thighs, arms, and legs. Three 3-inch-wide hook-and-loop straps of varying lengths (24, 16, and 10 inches) hold the wrap and patches in place. Some people believe magnets might relieve pain and improve blood flow to an injury, though these claims have not been medically established. The set carries a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Braun Clean & Renew 2 Cartridges
description: With the Braun Clean & Renew refills, you can keep your shaver in like-new condition every day.   Offered in both a 2-pack and 3-pack, the Clean & Renew refills are used in Braun’s patented Clean & Renew system base for when you are looking to clean, charge, and lubricate your Braun shaver.

title: Finally Free F-140 Ultra-Permanent Hair Removal System
description: This convenient hair removal system offers the permanence of salon electrolysis treatment without the redness and irritation that can follow. Clinically proven to be as effective as electrolysis, the system uses radio frequency to deaden hair at the root. Because hair grows in an 8-to-13-week cycle, you shouldn't see any regrowth for several weeks. And any regrowth should be finer than the original hair--not the dark stubble that follows shaving. It may take a few treatments to permanently remove hair, but eventually the roots will be destroyed and hair shouldn't reappear at all. For even smoother skin all over, you can adjust your treatment according to the body part being treated. For pesky individual hairs such as eyebrows, there's a tweezer; larger areas such as legs are best treated with the enclosed hair removal patch. Be sure to read the directions to avoid any potential skin irritation.--Laura Cuthbert

title: HoMedics Bubble Spa Massaging Bubble Mat
description: The bubble spa consists of two parts. Attach the mat to the bottom of your tub with the little rows of suction cups; then connect the mat to the plug-in pump that sits on the floor using the included tube. Fill the bath, switch the spa on, and the mat inflates slightly--then thousands of air bubbles swarm up out of it. It's a pleasant, relaxing experience, though "massage" is perhaps too strong a word for what warm air bubbles can do for you. The unit is equipped with an appliance leakage circuit interrupter for safety.--Richard Farr

title: HoMedics Replacement Toothbrush Heads for Hd-200 Rotary Toothbrush, Package of 3
description: By rotating through a 75-degree arc at a rapid rate (3,600 strokes per  minute), one of these three round brush heads snapped onto the power handle of  the HoMedicsHD-200 rotary  toothbrushscrubs away decay-causing plaque from between teeth and along gum  lines better than ordinary toothbrushes. To encourage kids to brush more  frequently, the color-coded brush heads, like the inexpensive toothbrush and its  recharging base, are cloaked in translucent blue plastic for a cool high-tech  look.--Fred Brack

title: Braun 5000/6000FC- XP 31B Flex Integral Foil/Cutterblock Replacement Pack, Black
description: Braun recommends that the heads on its Flex Integral electric razors (model numbers in the 5000 and 6000 series) be replaced every 18 months. This pack consists of the dual-foil and cutterblock for those Flex Integral razors. Though it will fit all Flex Integral razors, the dual-foil in this pack is housed in black and is best for models with black housing around their foils. (Replacement packs in other colors are also available.) Each of the two foils and the cutterblock perform individually as the razor runs across the face for a close, smooth shave. Installation is easy, and the diagrams on the package show how to set the razor up.--Fred Brack

title: Homedics Therapist Select Professional Percussion Massager
description: This electric massager is on call 24/7 to relieve sore muscles by  providing steady massage at different speeds, from gentle to invigorating. It  will massage hard, medium, or soft, depending on which set of attachments you've  twisted onto the two pivoting heads that direct massage waves deep into muscles.  The attachments are 1-3/4-inch-diameter color-coded domes. The massager has a  foam-cushioned handle for comfort. It's 13 inches long to reach the entire back,  the head is 6 inches wide, and the power cord measures 12 feet. The massager  carries a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Oral-B Professional Care 1000 Power Toothbrush
description: The Oral-B ProfessionalCare 1000 (formerly ProfessionalCare 7400) provides dentist-inspired cupping action in which a unique, round brush head surrounds each tooth for a tooth-by-tooth clean.  The combination of high-speed pulsations and the oscillating rotating technology has been shown to reduce plaque and gingivitis more effectively than a regular manual toothbrush.IntroductionWith dentist-inspired cupping action for tooth-by-tooth clean.ProfessionalCare 1000/7400 provides dentist-inspired cupping action in which a unique, round brush head surrounds each tooth for a tooth-by-tooth clean.Removes up to 97% of plaque from hard-to-reach areas*Helps prevent and reverse gingivitisPressure sensor stops pulsations when you’re brushing too hard1 mode: Daily CleanOral-B is the #1 dentist-recommended toothbrush brand worldwide* Based on single-use brushing studyProduct FeaturesFEATURESCleaning action:Provides 40,000 pulsations and 8,800 oscillations per minuteProfessional timer:A two-minute timer with 30-second intervals makes it easy to track how long you’ve been brushingPressure sensor:Stops pulsations to notify you when you’re brushing too hard1 customized brushing mode:Daily CleanIndicator® bristles:Remind you to replace your brush head every 3 months, once they’ve faded halfwayMultiple attachment brush heads with compact, round designPrecision Clean Brush Head:Provides a deep and thorough cleanDual Clean Brush Head:Provides cleaning, freshening and gum careCharge indicator:Lets you know that the brush is chargedDETAILS2-Year Limited Warranty and Satisfaction Guarantee:If you are not 100% satisfied within 60 days of purchase, return it for a full refund. Warranty includes replacement or repair. Consumer must ship product, postage paid, and include a copy of proof of purchase. See inside of product package for full details.Parts:Handle colors: Blue/whiteBrush head types: Oral-B Precision Clean, Oral-B Dual Clean, Oral-B Pro White, Oral-B Sensitive, Oral-B Power Tip, Oral-B Ortho, Oral-B Braces Care Essentials, Oral-B Tongue FreshenerSeries: ProfessionalCareModel: 1000/7400Power source: Rechargeable batteryBattery life: Up to 2 weeks without rechargingIn The BoxIncludes:*1 handle2 brush heads (Oral-B Precision Clean, Oral-B Dual Clean1 charging station*Contents may not be available in all models.

title: HoMedics FPA-2H Deluxe Personal Foot Massager with Heat
description: After exercise, work, shopping, or just a long day, nothing beats a  soothing foot massage. This portable electric foot massager is on call 24/7 to  relieve aching feet. Just sit down, take off your shoes, and run your feet over  the two domed 2-1/2-inch vibrating heads. Push the "heat" button on the  LED-illuminated, touchpad control panel with a big toe and the heads will warm  up, too. The control panel offers numerous options: steady massage at five  intensity levels or three different rhythms ("slow" to relax, "faster" to  penetrate deeply, and "quick" to stimulate). The massager measures 14 by 12  inches, is angled for comfort, and carries a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Braun 7000 Series Syncro Pro / Syncro Replacement Combo, Fits Braun Series 3
description: A replacement foil and cutter block, the two pieces fit Braun Syncro  shaver models 7505, 7526, 7546, and 7570. These shavers need a new foil and  cutter block every 12 to 18 months, depending on toughness of beard and  frequency of use. Braun Syncro shavers are noted for their four-way moving head  that captures and cuts more hair in fewer strokes. The pivoting head oscillates  from side to side, and large foil holes capture more hairs.--Fred Brack

title: Thermoscan Exactemp Ear
description: Get quick and accurate results with this Braun Thermoscan one-second ear thermometer. The thermometer beeps and confirms the end of the temperature measurement, displaying results within one second. Features extended memory for last temperature taken and an easy-to-read LCD display screen. Includes 21 lens filters and a protective case. Imported. 6-1/4L"

title: HOMEDICS BODY MASSEUR 10 PT.MA
description: This full-length massage pad offers a variety of features, all controlled from a simple unit attached by a short cord on the right side. The control unit has one button for each of the five pairs of motors and five other controls for speed, heat, massage style, and other features. Choose from three speeds and power levels and from steady, up-and-down, side to side, pulsating, and circulating massage. Works best flat or nearly flat. Made from soft foam, with a zippered cover.--Richard Farr

title: HoMedics PA-2H Programmable Percussion Action Massage with Heat
description: This is the stuff of dreams--your own personal massage assistant, on call 24/7 to relax sore, tired muscles or warm up slumbering ones. But it's no dream. This electric massager has all those virtues plus the capacity to provide steady massage at five intensity levels or work at three different rhythms (slow to relax, faster to penetrate deeply, and quick to stimulate). It can be set for hard, medium, or soft massage, and it massages with heat. All these options are available through an LED-illuminated, touch pad control panel and by changing the attachments on the dual pivoting heads that direct wave action deep into muscles. The attachments are domes of 1-3/4 inches in diameter that come in different colors (for hard, medium, soft, heat) and twist on and off. The massager is 14-3/4 inches long to reach your entire back, the head is 6 inches wide, and the power cord measures 12 feet. The massager carries a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: HoMedics HD-200 PowerDent Rotary Toothbrush
description: By rotating through a 75-degree arc at a rapid rate (3,600 strokes per  minute), a round brush head snapped onto this electric toothbrush's power handle  scrubs away decay-causing plaque from between teeth and along gum lines better  than ordinary toothbrushes. To encourage kids to brush more frequently, the  inexpensive toothbrush, its recharging base, and the three color-coded brush  heads are cloaked in translucent blue plastic for a cool high-tech look. The  recharging base provides four storage slots for brush heads not in use and can  be mounted with screw and screw plugs (included) on a counter. The toothbrush  comes with a two-year warranty against defects.Replacement brush headsare  available.--Fred Brack

title: BODY BASICS SOUND AND AROMA THERAPY ENVIR SP
description: Just add some steamed towels to this aroma and sound machine and you have a complete home spa. The machine, which resembles a small flying saucer, combines the ancient art of aromatherapy with modern sound technology for a rich sensory experience. You can customize your spa environment by choosing from four all-natural scents and six soothing sounds: ocean waves, a summer night, a brook, spring rain, woodland sounds, or white noise. Try experimenting with sound and scent combinations: the "relaxation" aroma beads, a blend of lavender, chamomile, and sage, work well with the sound of ocean waves if you want to drift off to sleep, for example. You can also use your own essential oils to further broaden your relaxation options. There's an aromatherapy-only option if you'd rather listen to your own music, as well as a sound-only option. The machine is powered by an AC adapter or four AA batteries (not included) and is small enough to slip into a suitcase.--Laura Cuthbert

title: Braun 4000FC-BK Flex Control Foil/Cutterblock Replacement Pack
description: Have you noticed a decline in your electric shaver's performance? Try replacing the blade. For optimum shaving performance, it should be replaced every 18 months. In fact, regular shavers estimate their shaves are 25 percent smoother after they replace a worn blade. This replacement blade snaps in easily for an instant improvement in your shave. For an even better shave, clean all parts regularly.--Laura Cuthbert

title: Braun 3000 Series InterFace/Interface Excel Replacement Pack
description: Braun recommends that the heads on its InterFace electric razors (model numbers in the 3615, 3612, and 3610 series) be replaced every 18 months. This pack consists of the foil and cutterblock for those InterFace razors. The foil is thin platinum and the cutterblock is stainless steel. The foil is spring-mounted for a close, comfortable shave. Installation is easy, and diagrams on the package show how to do it.--Fred Brack

title: Braun EE1170 Silk-Epil SuperSoft Plus Leg Hair Removal System
description: This electric device quickly and precisely removes hair from legs and arms while two stimulator wheels roll over the skin to mask the epilation feeling. By tweezing hairs at the roots, the device offers smooth, hairless skin for up to three weeks after treatment. As hairs grow back, they become finer, making them less noticeable and easier to remove. The device even removes extremely short hairs no more than .5 millimeter in length and offers two tweezer-grip settings--to distinguish between normal and fine hair--and three speeds. A cleaning brush, a tube of skin moisturizer, and a storage pouch are also included.--Fred Brack

title: Braun EP100 Exact Power Beard Trimmer
description: With a six-setting memory switch, this 5-watt trimmer ensures consistent beard and mustache lengths from trim to trim. It provides two speeds for careful trimming and the extra power needed to handle heavy-growth areas. With the distancing comb removed, the head pivots so that a narrow trimmer replaces the regular cutting head and permits precise outlining of beard, mustache, and sideburns. The memory switch can be set to trim hair to lengths of approximately 1, 3, 6, 9, 12, and 16 millimeters. Once the memory switch is set, it prevents the trimmer from turning on until you choose the proper length. The trimmer functions either with or without its cord. It fully charges in one hour for 30 minutes of cordless operation, works worldwide on 110- to 240-volt systems, and comes in a soft travel case. It carries a 30-day, full-refund guarantee and a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: HoMedics AK-3 Foot Pro Ultra Luxury Foot Massager
description: Sit down. Take off your shoes. Use a big toe to turn on this electric foot massager. (There's a toe-friendly on/off switch at the bottom.) Use that toe to select the intensity of the foot massage you desire (high or low). Cold feet? Direct the toe to the infrared switch for muscle-relaxing, penetrating heat. Now lean back and run your tired, aching feet over the massager's vibrating surface while different-size bumps rejuvenate you according to the ancient practice of reflexology (or, if you don't accept reflexology's tenets, soothingly stimulate your feet). This durable plastic device measures 14 by 12 inches and is angled so your feet rest comfortably while you're seated. The massager carries a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Oral-B D9511 Plak Control Ultra Power Toothbrush with Timer and Charger
description: Small and round for maneuverability inside the mouth, the brush head on this electric toothbrush rapidly oscillates to scrub away plaque from between teeth and along gum lines, giving your teeth a better cleaning than ordinary toothbrushes. Two sets of extra-long bristles on the brush head's sides clean deep between teeth, and soft, rounded middle bristles do their work gently and safely without the need for firm pressing. After two minutes, a pulsing signal indicates that you've reached the recommended brushing time, an incentive for children to continue brushing until the signal. This model comes with a recharging stand that you can place on the counter or mount on a wall (mounting screws are included) and one brush head with a removable color-coded ring. After up to three weeks of use, Braun offers a full-refund guarantee if you're not satisfied with your purchase. The handle carries a one-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Braun 3612 InterFace Rechargeable Shaver
description: Lightweight and shaped to fit the hand comfortably,  this electric razor delivers a smooth shave either with or  without a cord. A floating cutter trims long hairs, and then  a thin platinum foil follows along to shave close to the  skin. Push a button and the cutter retracts for shaving with  the foil alone. Push the button again, and up pops a trimmer  for mustache and sideburns. The shaver works worldwide on  110- to 240-volt systems and can be recharged by a 12-volt  car or boat battery. It recharges fully in one hour for 30  minutes of shaving time. A green light signals when charging  is underway. The shaver carries a two-year warranty against  defects (foil and cutter block excluded).--Fred  Brack

title: Homedics Luxury Foot Bubbler
description: Filled with warm water, this electric footbath presents a pleasing dilemma: massage your feet with the bath's warm, vibrating bottom and warm them with penetrating infrared heat? Massage, warm with infrared heat,andstimulate with bubbles? Or just treat those tired, aching tootsies to a warm, bubbling bath? (Warm water must be used initially, as the bath will not heat cold water.) A control dial offers those three options. Plus, you can insert one or another of three attachments in the bath's divider and run your feet over them for further relief. One attachment has a few large nodules, another has many small nodules, and the third is a roller. The infrared pad is situated on the divider. Made of translucent plastic for the high-tech look, the foot bath measures 18 by 15-1/2 by 7 inches and is about 3 inches deep. It carries a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Homedics Back Massager with Heat
description: With this device, there's no reason why sitting at home or the office or idling in rush-hour traffic can't be soothing and relaxing. It's a body-sculpted, padded, soft fabric body massager that fits most chairs and car seats, secures with elastic straps, and then massages shoulders, back, and thighs at five separate points with five little motors. It also produces heat for the lower back. An LED-illuminated remote control allows you to choose from three massage intensities, select for heat, and choose which body parts to massage. An AC home adapter and a 12-volt auto adapter come with the massager, which carries a two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Dirt Devil Replacement Sponge for Mop Vac
description: This 10-inch slide-on replacement sponge, with metal back, fits Dirt Devil mop vac models. It comes in a nice two-tone gray color. (Does this matter? Yes--it looks much better dirty than white or cream-colored sponges.)--Richard Farr

Energizer e2 is:Designed with a heart of titanium and advanced cell construction that takes power to the next level.Packaged in an easy open, easy close container for convenient use and storageEquipped with a gauge-style tester for an accurate read on remaining powerEngineered to mazimize performance in all your power-hungry devicesEnergizer e2 takes power to the next level—power you can enjoy when you listen to music, take pictures, play with toys, talk on the phone, light the path and simply enjoy the pleasures of an unplugged world.

title: Suunto Advizor Wrist-Top Computer Watch with Barometer, Compass, Altimeter, and Chronograph
description: Take your training to the next level with the Suunto Advizor. This wrist  computer receives a signal from the included heart-rate transmitter to measure  your total training time, maximum, minimum and average heart rate during  training, plus your time spent in, above, and below your preset target heart  rate. The Advizor also features an altimeter, barometer, and compass in its  stylish and rugged design.The Advizor looks like a high-end wristwatch, with an ABS plastic body and  elastic wristband. The body is gray, with an oversized backlit LCD screen. It is  made tough, built to be waterproof even submerged at 100 feet. The watch  displays day, time, and date with three programmable alarms and has a stopwatch  and countdown timer.The Advizor's altimeter allows you to view the current altitude with a range up  to 29,500 feet and a resolution of 10 feet. Also view your ascent/descent rate  in feet per minute. (All measurements are also available in metric units.) The  barometer allows you to measure the temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit,  absolute pressure, and a difference measurement to follow changes in barometric  pressure and temperature. The automatic four-day memory keeps track of  atmospheric pressure information. Another feature is the adjustable sea-level  pressure function.The compass shows directional bearing in degrees and cardinal or half-cardinal  point. There is a north-douth arrow and a bearing tracking function that  displays locked bearing, actual bearing, and the difference between these  declination adjustments. The compass's bubble level indicates a level position  to ensure reading accuracy within 2 to 3 degrees.The Advizor comes with a user-replaceable battery, which lasts up to 18 months,  and a low-battery indicator. It is covered by a one-year warranty.

description: One Bottle Simplicity.Cleans.Disinfects.Conditions.Rinses.Cushions.Wets. Boston Simplicity® Multi-Action Solutioncombines an effective cleaning system with a disinfecting and conditioning solution -In One Bottle.  Removes dirt and deposits without the need for a separate daily cleaner. Perfect for Today's Busy RGP Lens Wear. Our IngredientsWhat They DoCleaning System   Betaine Surfactant, PEO Sorbitan MonolaurateRemoves dirt and deposits from your lenses without a separate daily cleaner.Disinfecting System   Chlorhexidine gluconate (0.06%), Polyaminopropyl Biguanide (0.0005%), Edetate Disodium (0.05%)Dual disinfecting system destroys micor-organisms (germs).Wetting and Cushioning System Derivatized Polyethylene Glycol, Cellulosic Viscosifier, Silicone Glycol Copolymer, Polyvinyl AlcoholSurrounds lenses with moisture for wetting.  Cushions lenses. This unique patented formula is not sold to any retailer as a store brand. Because your eyes are so important®Don't experiment with just any brand.  Not all Gas Permeable Contact Lens Conditioning Solutions are the same.  Use only the brand recommended by your doctor. For weekly protein removal useBoston® One Step Liquid Enzymatic Cleaner. Made in USA.

description: Think about this: The pure pain relief of Tylenol PM works on your pain, isn't habit forming and helps you sleep so you feel refreshed the next day. Tylenol PM is a special Night Time medicine that combines Extra Strength Tylenol pain reliever with an ingredient that helps you rest. If you suffer from occasional pain and sleeplessness, a product such as Tylenol PM, which combines an effective sleep aid with a pain reliever, is an appropriate solution. Tylenol PM:is not habit-formingcontains a gentle sleep ingredient that has a well-established safety profileIf pain keeps you awake at night, you're not alone. A recent National Sleep Foundation survey found that 56 million Americans experience Night Time pain and sleeplessness, losing an average of more than 20 hours of sleep each month. Many of these people find it difficult to function at their best due to lack of sleep.Lack of sleep can:make performing even simple tasks difficultimpair short-term memory, concentration and alertnessincrease the chance of being in an accidentslow your body's ability to fight disease and repair tissueWhile everyone has different sleep needs, the National Sleep Foundation recommends that most people get eight hours of sleep per night. And it's not just the number of hours that count - it's also the quality of the sleep. It's important to get an uninterrupted, restful night's sleep.

An additional application is necessary if repeated intercourse takes place or if intercourse occurs more than six hours after insertion. For best protection against pregnancy, follow the enclosed instruction circular exactly.

description: America's No. 1 condom trusted for over 80 years. Helps reduce the risk of pregnancy and sexually transmitted diseases. Trojan Brand Latex Condoms, when used properly, are highly effective against pregnancy - although no contraceptive can guarantee 100% effectiveness. Any use of Trojan Brand Latex Condoms for other than vaginal intercourse can increase the potential of damage to the condom. Trojan Brand Latex Condoms, when used properly, may help reduce the risk of catching or spreading many Sexually Transmitted Diseases (STDs) such as syphilis, gonorrhea, chlamydia infections, genital herpes, and AIDS; however, they cannot eliminate the risk. For maximum benefits, it is important to follow the instructions for use printed on the inner side of this package. Failure to do so may result in the loss of the benefits of a condom. During intimate contact, lesions and various body fluids can transmit STDs. Therefore, a new condom should be applied each and every time before any such contact occurs.

title: First Response Ovulation Test, 7-Test Kit Plus 1 Pregnancy Test
description: Kit Includes: 7 Tests. Predicts the 2 days when you are most likely to become pregnant. Easy-read result line. First Response Easy-Read Ovulation Predictor Test is an easy way to help you find the 2 days when you are most able to become pregnant. It quickly and accurately detects the increase in luteinizing hormone in your urine (LH surge), which normally occurs 24-36 hours before ovulation. Your two most fertile days begin with the LH surge. You are most likely to become pregnant if you have intercourse within 24-36 hours after you detect your LH surge. Easy to Use: One easy step. Simply hold the stick in your urine stream. No cup. No mess. Accurate: Over 98% accurate in laboratory studies. Fast: Easy-read results in just 5 minutes. Easy to Read: One purple line tells you the test is working. The appearance of a second line that is similar or darker in color than the first line means that you should ovulate within 24-36 hours. Now with easy-read result line. Convenient: Test any time of day. Pregnancy test inside! Test 5 days sooner - than other leading pregnancy tests. For in-vitro diagnostic use. Not to be taken internally.

description: Immediate Pain Relief for many common sports injuries in the lower body. Supports the foot to prevent overpronation - a leading cause of runner's knee, shin splints and lower back pain. 1. Immediate Pain Relief -Dr. Scholl's® DynaStep® Sport Inserts are performance proven to provide immediate pain relief from many common sports injuries in your lower body due to overpronation. Knee Pain - e.g. runner's knee.Heel Pain - e.g. plantar fascitis.Shin Pain - e.g. shin splints.Foot, Arch Pain -e.g. strain and fatigue.Leg Pain - e.g. Achilles tendonitis.Back Pain - e.g. strain and fatigue.DynaStep Sport Inserts have a contoured U-shaped design that gently cradles each foot to provide the support you need for immediate and effective pain relief.2. Prevents A Leading Cause of Lower Body Sports Injuries -DynaStep Sport Inserts are clinically proven to prevent overpronation - a leading cause of many lower body sports injuries.  Almost everyone has experienced some form of pain from playing sports.  If you experience one or more lower body pains, they may stem from the same source - inadequate foot support.  Without proper support your foot can roll inward and flatten more than it should (overpronation).  This puts added strain on the muscles, tendons, ligaments and bones in your lower body and is a leading cause of many common sports injuries.  Wearing DynaStep Sport Inserts helps reduce your risk of suffering from these injuries.3. Performance Proven with Athletes -DynaStep Sport Inserts are performance proven to relieve pain among a variety of athletes playing a range of sporting activities - field, running and walking sports.  Athletes wearing DynaStep Sport Inserts experienced immediate pain relief from overpronation injuries.  In fact, 9 out of 10 athletes wearing DynaStep Sport Inserts reported they were able to perform at pre-injury levels or better after only one week.4. Advanced Hi-Tech System for Sports Performance -Dyna Step Sport Inserts use the same patented technology found in custom orthotics.  In addition, DynaStep Sport Inserts are designed with a premium topcloth for performance in sports footwear:advanced system wicks away moisture to keep feet dry.Antimicrobial treatment prevents growth of odor causing bacteria on the topcloth.DynaStep Sport Inserts work in four important ways to provide relief from pain and fatigue:cup your heel for improved stability and balance.provide superior shock absorption and protection.support your arch to stop inward rolling.cradle your foot to guide movement.Wear DynaStep Sport Inserts for optimum performance.Made in the U.S.A.
